abstract: A federal report cited deficiencies at the McNeil Consumer Healthcare plant in Fort Washington, Pa., that makes children’s liquid Tylenol and Motrin.
snippet: A federal report cited deficiencies at the McNeil Consumer Healthcare plant in Fort Washington, Pa., that makes children’s liquid Tylenol and Motrin.
lead_paragraph: The Johnson & Johnson unit that voluntarily recalled certain lots of children’s liquid Tylenol and Motrin over the weekend had numerous and wide-ranging quality control problems at the plant that made the products, according to a federal inspection report released Tuesday.

headline.main: Agency Told Tylenol Maker of Many Quality Concerns
headline.print_headline: Agency Told Tylenol Maker of Many Quality Concerns
